summary: Shatha the Argonian Assassin, featured in my Skyrim Let\'s play
descriptionHtml:
This is a clone for a follower in my Argonian Mage Playthrough.
Alot of my viewers asked for an Argonian Follower, and since Shatha from my \"other\" Let\'s Play had been rather popular i decided to give it a try and create him as a follower.

The result is pretty nice, so i hope you all will enjoy :)

Shatha can be found in Riverwood in the Inn.
He is proficient in Daggers aswell as a bow, and comes with standard elven versions.
In my Let\'s Play he became a member of the Dark Brotherhood, and thus he wears the Dark Brotherhood armor.

For any backstory i would refer people to go watch my Argonian Assassin Playthrough, it currently contains over 100 episodes spanning from when Skyrim was released until early January this year.

Shatha is fully compatible with U.F.O.

I am not responsible for any errors that may happen after downloading this companion.
author: JoxerNL
